name: Sybil Resistance
description: Sybil resistance is an important aspect for creating fair governance systems and crypto networks. This quest combines different identity mechanisms to provide trust scores that can help minimize sybil attacks.

tasks.name: ENS
tasks.description: Register your unique ENS name at https://app.ens.domains/.

tasks.name: POAP
tasks.description: POAPs https://poap.xyz/ are digital mementos, minted in celebration of life's remarkable moments. Gain points for each POAP that you collected.

tasks.name: BrightID
tasks.description: BrightID https://www.brightid.org/ is a social identity network that allows you to prove that you're only using one account. NOT ACTIVE YET

tasks.name: Proof of Humanity
tasks.description: Register yourself and get vouched by an existing member of the PoH community at https://www.proofofhumanity.id/
